document.forum_title: Obituaries - Devils Lake Journal - Devils Lake, ND
document.topic_text: OBIT: Robert Ray Cunningham Robert Ray Cunningham, 62, of rural Brocket, ND, died Tuesday, August 9, 2016, at his home. 11, 2016 at 10:06 AM Posted Aug. 11, 2016 at 10:06 AM Robert Ray Cunningham, 62, of rural Brocket, ND, died Tuesday, August 9, 2016, at his home. Robert “Bob” Cunningham was born November 28, 1953 to Ray and Julie Cunningham of rural Brocket, ND. He graduated from Lakota High School and North Dakota State College of Science at Wahpeton. Bob is survived by his son, Tim (Janice) of Woodbury, MD; two brothers, Rod of Fargo, ND and Rick (Julie) of Kansas City, MO; three sisters, Judy of Fargo, ND, Janet (Wayne) Fiechtner of Monango, ND, and Joyce (Keith) Bold of Los Gatos, CA; and many nieces and nephews. The memorial service will be held at the Aaker Funeral Home of Lakota, on Saturday, August 13 at 2 p.m. Visitation will be for one hour prior to the service. Condolences may be left at www.iversonkassianfuneralservices.com . Arrangements with the Aaker Funeral Home of Lakota.
